content: this is just one of those quintessential hats that you need in your wardrobe it s an easy 2x2 rib pattern with an oversized brim to keep your ears nice and warm the 2x2 ribbing gives a lot of stretch so this hat is great for nearly every sized adult head it looks great in variegated tonal and single colored yarns - so go wild and have fun be sure to tag your creations in instagram with the hashtags #cozycoffeeknits and #astridhat so i can see them and share them out to our community
